name: God Ending (Cleytulf)
description:
Zeus, God of the Gods, inherited this title after killing his father Cronos, in order to save his brothers and sisters. After ruling for millions of years and experiencing many adventures, he has decided to end his life. You must help him find the best way to kill himself. May this last step be worthy of Olympus!

The goal is to kill Zeus in various ways. And if you're brave enough, you can unlock the door to the underworld and reach the end of the game.

We are a teams of French students of the same school Brassart :) Make with Unreal Engine 

We are a French studient team from the Brassart School in Grenoble.
We made this game in 3 days  during the GDL August 2022 Jam.

The Game Designer team : 

  • Roxane Jacquot (Calinaura : https://calinaura.itch.io/): 2D artist 
  • Mathieu Botella (Matelpitou : https://matelpitou.itch.io/): Programmer 
  • Rémy Istasse (Cleytulf : https://rims-itase.itch.io/): Programmer 
  • Mehdi Ruche (Drake : https://drake74.itch.io/): Level Designer 

The 3D team (a great thanks to them ) :  

  • Inès Chmourrane (@inesc_pro): Trident, Cupid's arrow and main menu illustration
  • Pigeonnator9000: Zeus 
  • Leny Helbert (https://ultibalo.artstation.com/): Thor's hammer and divine shovel 

Assets used :

  • Pack Unreal Engine : 
  • AdvancesVillagePack 
  • Cartoon Water Shader 
  •  DreamScape Series 
  •  Fantasy Orchestral 
  • FXVariety Pack 
  • Human Vocalizations 
  • Interface And Item Sounds 
  • Low Poly Medieval Constructions 
  • Quadraped Creatures Animation 
  • Mixamo Asset 
  • Megascans texture
